headline: 3 Top Dividend ETFs to Buy in June for a Lifetime of Passive Income
summary: The Vanguard Utilities ETF invests in utilities, which tend to pay high-yielding and steadily rising dividends.  The Vanguard Real Estate ETF holds REITs, many of which have excellent records of increasing their high-yielding payouts.  Investing in exchange-traded funds (ETFs) makes it super easy to collect passive income.
